ing: 4 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and cut into bite-size pieces
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
3 chocolate-coated caramel-peanut nougat candy bars (such as SnickersÂ®), cut into bite-size pieces
des: "This is a unique treat with no baking required. It tastes just like a caramel apple and is great in the summer or the fall."
ins: Mix crushed pineapple, Granny Smith apples, whipped topping, candy bars, and peanuts in a bowl.
